levels.description: The next attack buries a mine (lasts for 120 seconds) in a deployable tile within this unit's Attack Range; The mine will detonate when an enemy passes by it, dealing <@ba.vup>{atk_scale:0%}</> Physical damage to all nearby enemies and <$ba.stun>Stunning</> them for <@ba.vup>{stun}</> seconds
